title: [Large-scale] Mobile Augmented Reality (mAR)-Enhanced Mathematics Concept Comprehension Program for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic arithmetic operations and fundamental geometric concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on spatial visualization and interactive learning through smartphone-based mAR interfaces, with asynchronous learning activities integrated with LMS.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the structural properties of 3D geometric shapes through an mAR interface with 80% accuracy.

Learners will select three types of math problems (geometry, algebra, statistics) in an augmented reality environment (e.g., GeoGebra AR, MathCityMap) and create 3â€“5-minute screencasts of their problem-solving processes, achieving an "excellent" rating in at least two of three rubric items (content accuracy, explanation clarity, visual effectiveness).
Learners can achieve an average score of over 75 points on tasks utilizing mAR simulations in weekly formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
